publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1593 John Scott: Support for an Armed Forces Day—That the Parliament welcomes the campaign for the UK Government to establish an official day to honour British soldiers, sailors, airmen and women on active service; believes that such an official day would offer an opportunity to recognise the bravery and dedication of our armed forces; notes the result of a recent opinion poll recording 77% public approval for the creation of an official day of recognition for the armed services, and calls on the UK Government to establish an annual armed forces day. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-1593 Support for an Armed Forces Day (lodged on 18 March 2008) Jamie McGrigor*, Jamie Stone*, John Lamont*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Tolson*, Bill Aitken*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Mike Pringle*
